message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $18,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $19,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still not able to go above $18,000 for the product. I believe we can find a middle ground here. How about $18,500?
